errors.error: TypeError: Cannot read property 'length' of undefined
errors.description: Occurs when trying to access the 'length' property of a variable that is either null or undefined.
errors.solution: Ensure the variable is initialized and is not null before trying to access its properties.
errors.cause: The variable being accessed is null or undefined.
suggestions: Check if the variable is properly initialized.
Use a null or undefined check before accessing its properties.
Add default values to ensure the variable is always defined.
